1.说明：读SEUID ，TX1引脚打印，波特率1000000
AT+GETSEUID   

2.声明字符数
AT+SEPER_START=572

3. 第一次传送数据
AT+SEPER="00010000000059EA3D099706FFFFFFFF60115EBF73788F1AA1D3A763CF047E65FFFFFFFFFF01010101200507000002112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF00112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF001234112233445566778899AABBCC"

4.第二次传送数据
AT+SEPER="DDEEFF00112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF00112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF00112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF00010D636f6d2e776874792e776966692020202020202020202020202020202020202020202020202"

5.第三次传送数据
AT+SEPER="0204A692e6d736d6172746c6966652e636f6d2f6e66633f623d3126747970653d30302666756e3d312663643d3030303030303331313232303131393837393631353033353030315a3030303020202020202020202020202020202020202020202020202020"

6.合并写入数据
AT+SEPER_END
